      • updateRoomStatus

        public static boolean updateRoomStatus​(int floorNumber,
                                       int roomNumber,
                                       RoomStatus roomStatus,
                                       java.lang.String guestId)
        Method to update the Room status by floor and room number

        Parameters:
        floorNumber - floor number of the room
        roomNumber - room number of the room
        roomStatus - room status of the room
        guestId - Id of the guest to be added/removed from the room
        Returns:
        true if successful. Otherwise, false if the room id not found.

                              boolean isSmokingAllowed)
        constructor of the room

        see RoomType For the different room type

        see RoomStatus For the different status of the room

        Parameters:
        roomType - Type of the room
        roomId - the room Id for the room
        floorNumber - Floor number of the room
        roomNumber - Room number of the room
        roomStatus - Status of the room
        isWifiEnabled - whether the wifi is enabled in the room
        isSmokingAllowed - whether the smoking is allowed in the room
        Returns:
        the new Room object

      • checkRoomVacancy

                                       RoomStatus roomStatus)
        Check if the room has vacancy

        See RoomStatus for the different types of room status

        Parameters:
        roomId - room id of the room you want to check
        roomStatus - room status of the room to compare
        Returns:
        true if this room has vacancy. Otherwise, false

      • validateNumOfPax

        public static boolean validateNumOfPax​(java.lang.String roomId,
                                       int numOfPax)
        Validate if the number of pax exceeds the maximum capacity of the room or not.
        Parameters:
        roomId - room id of the room you want to check
        numOfPax - the number of pax of the room
        Returns:
        true if the number of pax does not exceed the room capacity. Otherwise, false
